Name: 胆小鬼 Coward
About the game: This is a kind of horror survival game Suicide doesn't save you. Your soul is trapped in the house by demons. Unable to extricate, the only way to escape the demon within five days. Demons will keep crawling out of holes in the floor and killing you. You will hear the sound of the board collapsing. You must repair the holes with the board to stop them, but it will consume your repair value. At the same time, looking for people who can't get rid of suicide. To save them is to help themselves. The devil will come up and chase you. Please look for boxes to avoid. In a dark room, the piano will help you. Only calm can win. The sound effects of this game have hints, it is recommended to bring headphones to play.
